entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 10 April 2023
